entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
